data.title: SOX Section 302.2 - 302.3: Prevent data tampering
data.phrase:
datamodel 
| filter xdm.event.operation = "FILE_WRITE"  /*Filter for file write events*/
| filter xdm.source.host.hostname contains "*"
| fields _time, xdm.event.type, xdm.event.operation, xdm.event.operation_sub_type, xdm.source.host.hostname, xdm.source.user.username, xdm.source.agent.identifier, xdm.source.process.name, xdm.source.process.executable.path, xdm.event.outcome, xdm.observer.product

data.title: SOX Section 302.4.B: Track Data Access
data.phrase:
/*datamodel | filter xdm.auth.auth_method contains "" |fields xdm.auth.**/

datamodel 
| filter xdm.target.location.region contains "*" 
| fields xdm.target.agent.identifier, xdm.target.asn.as_name, xdm.target.asn.as_number, xdm.target.host.fqdn, xdm.target.ipv4, xdm.target.location.city, xdm.target.location.continent, xdm.target.location.country, xdm.target.location.latitude, xdm.target.location.longitude , xdm.target.location.region
| comp count(xdm.target.location.country) as counter by xdm.target.location.country 
| view graph type = map xaxis = xdm.target.location.country yaxis = counter default_limit = `false` seriestitle("counter","Volume")

data.title: SOX Section 302.4.C: Validate systems are operational
data.phrase:
datamodel | filter xdm.observer.product contains "*"
| dedup xdm.observer.name
| fields xdm.observer.product , xdm.observer.name, xdm.observer.content_version, xdm.observer.type, xdm.observer.unique_identifier, xdm.observer.vendor, xdm.observer.version, _time

data.title: SOX Section 302.5.A - 302.5.B: Detect Security Breaches
data.phrase:
datamodel
| filter xdm.network.rule contains "*"
| fields xdm.network.rule, xdm.network.application_protocol, xdm.network.application_protocol_category, xdm.network.http.method, xdm.network.http.response_code, xdm.network.http.url_category, xdm.network.ip_protocol, xdm.network.protocol_layers, xdm.network.session_id
